description:
Feel the burn in your muscles, and only your muscles. This Chamois Butt’r is an anti-chafing cream optimized for women with sensitive skin. Loaded with nourishing ingredients like shea butter and vitamin E, it prevent chafing and helps skin stay healthy and moisturized.

  • Key ingredients: lavender oil, shea butter, green tea extract, aloe vera and tea tree oil
  • No parabens, phthalates, gluten or artificial fragrances
  • Soothes irritated, chafed skin
  • Won't stain skin or clothing
  • Water soluble formula rinses off skin and out of clothing easily
  • Ingredients: aqua/water/eau, paraffinum liquidum/mineral oil/huile minérale, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, stearic acid, glycerin, lanolin, cetyl hydroxyethylcellulose, peg-100 stearate, diazolidinyl urea, iodopropynyl butylcarbamate, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), lavandula angustifolia (lavender) oil, potassium sorbate, disodium edta, camellia sinensis (green tea) leaf extract, aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice, tocopheryl acetate (vitamin e), melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree) leaf oil, retinyl palmitate (vitamin a)
name: Chamois Butt'r Her Anti-Chafe Cream
